definition: affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means

sentences.english: However, the assignor may be liable to the obligor for breach of contract.
sentences.chinese: 但是，讓與人可能因而向債務人承擔違約義務。

sentences.english: Debt collectors buy old debts from companies or lenders for pennies on the dollar.
sentences.chinese: 債主從公司收舊賬或者跟債務人討小錢。

sentences.english: The obligor May avail itself of any set-off against the assignee.
sentences.chinese: 債務人可以向受讓人主張抵銷。

sentences.english: A loan that must repaid upon the lender's demand. Also called callable loan.
sentences.chinese: 可隨時通知債務人償還的貸款，又稱可收回貸款。

sentences.english: The debtor or a third party may offer a specific property as a pledge.
sentences.chinese: 債務人或者第三人可以提供一定的財產作爲抵押物。

sentences.english: If the debtor assigns its obligations, it shall go through relevant procedures.
sentences.chinese: 債務人轉移義務應依法辦理有關手續。

sentences.english: This part also introduces the debtor's right of defense and right of offset.
sentences.chinese: 同時，該部分對債務人之抗辯權和抵銷權也作了介紹。

sentences.english: Therefore, the competition between banks included two sides, the debtors and loaners.
sentences.chinese: 因此，銀行間的競爭包括兩個方面，債務人和債權人。

sentences.english: I  debated that the  debtor was  doubtless in double troubles.
sentences.chinese: 我爭論說債務人很可能處在雙重困境中。

sentences.english: If debtor person violates the obligation, he ought to bear the guarantee liability about blemish.
sentences.chinese: 如果債務人違反此種義務，則應負瑕疵擔保責任。

sentences.english: That debtor in a sales contract is the Seller.
sentences.chinese: 在銷售合同中，此債務人爲賣方。

sentences.english: Otherwise the original obligor and the new obligor are collectively and bisectally liable.
sentences.chinese: 其餘情況下，原債務人和新債務人承擔連帶責任。

sentences.english: Otherwise the original obligor and the new obligor are collectively and bisectally liable.
sentences.chinese: 其餘情況下，原債務人和新債務人承擔連帶責任。

sentences.english: After the debtor has discharged his debt, the deposit shall either be retained as partial payment of the debt or be returned.
sentences.chinese: 債務人履行債務後，定金應當抵作價款或者收回。

sentences.english: Debtor's appeal was rejected for the request of repayment after time limitation for court.
sentences.chinese: 還款後方知訴訟時效已過債務人訴請返款被駁回。

sentences.english: In this economic environment, savers are losers and debtors are winners.
sentences.chinese: 在這樣的經濟環境下，儲戶是輸家，債務人是贏家。

definition: to repay a debt in full/to redeem/to clear
to bear joint responsibility for sth/joint liability (law)
common plea/civil appeal (as opposed to criminal case)
to recover (stolen property)/to pursue and force sb to give back the spoils
to counter accusations/to protest/to remonstrate/to retort/to plead/to demur/a plea (of not guilty)/a defense (against an allegation)/to enter a plea to a charge (in a law court)
